label: ham
subject: [Ip-health] Literature on the Use of Patents in Public Private  Partnerships
body: The above form is theoretical in so far as commodities are only _thought of_ as definite quantities of materialized universal labor-time. But the capacity of a particular commodity to serve as a universal equivalent from a mere abstraction becomes a _social_ result of the process of exchange by a simple inversion of the above series of equations, viz.:
